name: GetFrameInfo
description:
Retrieve specific frame details from a Miro board.

This tool retrieves information about a particular frame on a specified Miro board. It is useful when you need details of a frame, such as its size and content, for board organization or analysis.

parameters.name: board_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the board containing the frame to retrieve.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board that contains the frame that you want to retrieve

parameters.name: frame_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the frame to retrieve from the board.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the frame that you want to retrieve.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the miro API.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board that contains the frame that you want to retrieve

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board that contains the frame that you want to retrieve

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the frame that you want to retrieve.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the frame that you want to retrieve.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
